messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] lynda
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/18/2000 3:25:03 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... If I recall, you mentioned you haven t read any of the Harry Potter books. If so, definitely
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/18/2000 3:25:03 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
tonitoni@... writes:

>
> Miss read your post.
> I meant I hope i can get a book for $10! No Costco here in New
> Zealand. I expect they cost quite a bit more than $10...
> Marianne
>
>
If I recall, you mentioned you haven't read any of the Harry Potter books.
If so, definitely start with the first one and work your way through the
series. It is a great series. A bonus benefit is that the earlier books are
available in paperback (at least here in the US). Otherwise, the US price,
without discount, is something like $27.

Eiraul
